comment: This is a solid, reliable drop of Irish whiskey. Vanilla, coconut, spice, spearmint, and mandarin orange and licorice on the finish. This seems a little young yet, with more nip and burn than can be written off as "spicy" from barrel influence. Enjoyable, but it needs a little more time to grow into its potential.
2017 San Francisco World Spirit Competition Award Winner
Mild, sweet and smooth. Gentle warmth and not a lot of burn for the strength.

Tipperary
I’m disappointed in this Irish Whisky. Boutique edition??? Sorry
hell Gelb. N: Fruchtig, weißer Wein, Traube/Pflaume, vanlille. G: leicht sprittig, Pfeffer, bitter säuerlich. A: flach, fruchtig süß
Very grassy, some lemon. But lots of grass in this
Almost 3.5. Not bad. Just missing something.
